Yes it's two Windows 95 games. It runs under all Windows environments, even Windows Vista.
my computer has informed me that Lemmings can't run because readdib.dll isn't there, but it definitely is. Did anyone else have a problem with this?

@vivaciousvandal: Here's a solution to your problem:
1. Open the RUN prompt.
2. Type in regsvr32 "C:\Windows\System32\readdib.dll" or wherever the DLL file is.
3. Press enter.
4. ???
4. Profit!

IMO, the best way to use this (since it's so old now - Windows 95) is to download Lemmini (http://lemmini.de/), a Java rewrite of the Lemmings engine, then just use the original graphics from this torrent.
